00195 
00197 #define ACMP_CAPSENSE_INIT_DEFAULT                        \
00198   { false,              /* fullBias */                    \
00199     false,              /* halfBias */                    \
00200     0x7,                /* biasProg */                    \
00201     acmpWarmTime512,    /* 512 cycle warmup to be safe */ \
00202     acmpHysteresisLevel5,                                 \
00203     acmpResistor3,                                        \
00204     false,              /* low power reference */         \
00205     0x3D,               /* VDD level */                   \
00206     true                /* Enable after init. */          \
00207   }
00208

00251 
00253 #define ACMP_INIT_DEFAULT                                                     \
00254   { false,              /* fullBias */                                        \
00255     false,              /* halfBias */                                        \
00256     0x7,                /* biasProg */                                        \
00257     false,              /* No interrupt on falling edge. */                   \
00258     false,              /* No interrupt on rising edge. */                    \
00259     acmpWarmTime512,    /* 512 cycle warmup to be safe */                     \
00260     acmpHysteresisLevel5,                                                     \
00261     false,              /* Disabled emitting inactive value during warmup. */ \
00262     false,              /* low power reference */                             \
00263     0x3D,               /* VDD level */                                       \
00264     true                /* Enable after init. */                              \
00265   }

00281 /***************************************************************************/
00292 __STATIC_INLINE void ACMP_IntClear(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, uint32_t flags)
00293 {
00294   acmp->IFC = flags;
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 /***************************************************************************/
00309 __STATIC_INLINE void ACMP_IntDisable(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, uint32_t flags)
00310 {
00311   acmp->IEN &= ~(flags);
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 /***************************************************************************/
00331 __STATIC_INLINE void ACMP_IntEnable(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, uint32_t flags)
00332 {
00333   acmp->IEN |= flags;
00334 }
00335 
00336 
00337 /***************************************************************************/
00351 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t ACMP_IntGet(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp)
00352 {
00353   return(acmp->IF);
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00357 /***************************************************************************/
00376 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t ACMP_IntGetEnabled(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp)
00377 {
00378   uint32_t tmp;
00379 
00380   /* Store ACMPx->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00381    * of volatile accesses. */
00382   tmp = acmp->IEN;
00383 
00384   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00385   return acmp->IF & tmp;
00386 }
00387 
00388 
00389 /***************************************************************************/
00400 __STATIC_INLINE void ACMP_IntSet(ACMP_TypeDef *acmp, uint32_t flags)
00401 {
00402   acmp->IFS = flags;
00403 }
